summary: A wannabe rowdy who falls for a hearing-impaired girl faces a dilemma when the girl makes a shocking request.
cast: Vijay Sethupathi|Nayanthara|Parthiban|Radhika Sarathkumar|RJ Balaji|Anandraj|Motta Rajendran|Azhagam Perumal|Meenakshi|Mansoor Ali Khan|Surya Vijay Sethupathi|Rajavel Thatha|R. Sundarajan|Anikha Surendran|R.N.R. Manohar|Dhilip Subbarayan
title: Naanum Rowdydhaan
